title: Yellowstone National Park: Painting & Photography Tours
body: Permitted Painting and Photography Tour Companies       A commercial business permit is required to guide trips in Yellowstone National Park. The table below lists painting and photography trip providers that have permits to operate in Yellowstone National Park.      A   A Naturalist's World (406) 848-9458   Aaron's Photo Tours (425) 760-1505   Adventure Yellowstone, Inc. (406) 585-9041   Alpenglow Photography Tours (307) 739-1914   Aperture Academy (209) 642-5310       B Backcountry Safari (307) 413-9300 Batdorff Photography, LLC (773) 293-6548 Buffalo Bus Touring Company (406) 646-9564 or (800) 426-7669       C Cindy Goeddel Photography (858) 848-4150      E Elk River Art(406) 848-9449      F FoxDen Images (816) 665-9025 Franzfoto Nature & Wildlife Photography (307) 272-6671      G  Grizzly Guy, Inc. (406) 794-6812         J Jackson Hole Wildlife Safaris, LLC (307) 690-6402 Jared Loyd Photography (610) 290-3239 Jess Lee Photography (208) 521-5170 Joseph Van Os Photo Safaris (206) 463-5383 Juan Pons Photography (919) 608-9068      L Lone Mountain Ranch 406-995-4644 Low Impact Wildlife Photography (530) 577-4101       M Max Waugh (206) 310-3796 McDonald Wildlife Photography, Inc.
